card.name: Blade Instructor
card.property: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Watch carefully. The gap between death and victory is thinner than your blade."

card.name: Bounty Agent
card.property: Vigilance {T}, Sacrifice Bounty Agent: Destroy target legendary permanent that's an artifact, creature, or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lately I've seen the biggest bounties of my career—and for the biggest names."

card.name: Candlelight Vigil
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+2 and has vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Selesnya guildmages do not sleep so the rest of the conclave can.

card.name: Citywide Bust
card.property: Destroy all creatures with toughness 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oh, you fellas are going to love the lockup. Excellent gruel. Very low ceilings."—Libuse, Boros sergeant

card.name: Collar the Culprit
card.property: Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Reports of Gruul rioters in four districts. Start with the big ones and work your way up."—Libuse, Boros sergeant

card.name: Conclave Tribunal
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) When Conclave Tribunal enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Conclave Tribunal leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Crush Contraband
card.property: Choose one or both — • Exile target artifact. • Exile target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet mage knew she would neither get her thermoinverter back nor have the satisfaction of exploding it herself.

card.name: Dawn of Hope
card.property: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card. {3}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To wage war, secure peace within yourself."—Emmara

card.name: Demotion
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's no greater honor than joining your chosen guild, and no greater shame than failing it.

card.name: Divine Visitation
card.property: If one or more creature tokens would be created under your control, that many 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance are created instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The angels appreciated the offer but politely declined to eat any birdseed.

card.name: Flight of Equenauts
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yes, there's competition between our equenauts and the Boros skyjeks. At least they think it's a competition."

card.name: Gird for Battle
card.property: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You won't need the sword drills, your shields, or my blessing. You'll fight for Sunhome with the truth in your heart."—Aurelia

card.name: Haazda Marshal
card.property: Whenever Haazda Marshal and at least two other creatures attack, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ravnica's convoluted power structure often boils down to who can muster the most swords on a given block.

card.name: Healer's Hawk
card.property: Flying, lifelink

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wounded see the glow of its vials long before they see its wings diving out of the clouds.

card.name: Hunted Witness
card.property: When Hunted Witness dies, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He ferried weapons, spells, exotic animals—but his most dangerous cargo was the truth.

card.name: Inspiring Unicorn
card.property: Whenever Inspiring Unicorn attacks, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are two lives: The life you live before you see a unicorn, and the life you live after.

card.name: Intrusive Packbeast
card.property: Vigilance When Intrusive Packbeast enters the battlefield, tap up to two target creatures your opponents control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Good at carrying things. Really good at knocking them down.

card.name: Ledev Guardian
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of the creature's color.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've raised her since she was a pup, and she's raised me since I was a recruit."

card.name: Light of the Legion
card.property: Flying Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.) When Light of the Legion dies, put a +1/+1 counter on each white creature you control.

card.name: Loxodon Restorer
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) When Loxodon Restorer enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

card.name: Luminous Bonds
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Article 5.8.2. Ensure proper restraint of any and all arms, legs, claws, jaws, tails, tentacles, and tendrils as appropriate."—*Azorius Arrester Procedure*, Appendix B.

card.name: Parhelion Patrol
card.property: Flying, vigilance Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Too many have disappeared in these dark days. I am the light that will lead them home."

card.name: Righteous Blow
card.property: Righteous Blow deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Golgari believe they should be given what they deserved. On this we agree."—Tajic

card.name: Roc Charger
card.property: Flying Whenever Roc Charger attacks, target attacking creature without flying gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rocs' innate fearlessness makes them ideal mounts for emergency response.

card.name: Skyline Scout
card.property: Whenever Skyline Scout attacks, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, it gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes an angel passes by and gives me a little nod, like, 'You're a daring one!' That always makes my day."

card.name: Sunhome Stalwart
card.property: First strike Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Before I let you wield one of these, let's see you dodge one!"

card.name: Sworn Companions
card.property: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens with lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The trouble with youths these days is that, in outright defiance of their elders, they refuse to be bought."—Karlov of the Ghost Council

card.name: Take Heart
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You gain 1 life for each attacking creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the quiet before a battle, Boros soldiers whisper prayers that steady their nerves and focus their minds.

card.name: Tenth District Guard
card.property: When Tenth District Guard enters the battlefield, target creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Tenth has always been my home. This city is constantly embroiled in one crisis or another, but I'm determined to protect my piece."

card.name: Venerated Loxodon
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of the creature's color.) When Venerated Loxodon enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature that convoked it.

card.name: Capture Sphere
card.property: Flash Enchant creature When Capture Sphere enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Chemister's Insight
card.property: Draw two cards. Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My specialty is theoretical universal limits and ways to circumvent them."

card.name: Citywatch Sphinx
card.property: Flying When Citywatch Sphinx dies, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on the top of your library in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All those who trade in questions must answer to the Dimir.

card.name: Dazzling Lights
card.property: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on the top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Devious Cover-Up
card.property: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. You may shuffle up to four target cards from your graveyard into your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: First, dispose of the evidence. Then dispose of your knowledge of the disposal.

card.name: Dimir Informant
card.property: When Dimir Informant enters the battlefield, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on the top of your library in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The letters arrive, all sealed and read.

card.name: Disdainful Stroke
card.property: Counter target spell with converted mana cost 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Laws apply only to those who lack the vision to see past them."

card.name: Dream Eater
card.property: Flash Flying When Dream Eater enters the battlefield, surveil 4. When you do, you may return target nonland permanent an opponent controls to its owner's hand. (To surveil 4, look at the top four cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Drowned Secrets
card.property: Whenever you cast a blue spell, target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beneath Ravnica's streets runs a layer of tunnels, then caverns, then waterways, then terrors and nightmares.

card.name: Enhanced Surveillance
card.property: You may look at an additional two cards each time you surveil. Exile Enhanced Surveillance: Shuffle your graveyard into your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who are the agents of the Dimir? No one and everyone."—Lazav

card.name: Guild Summit
card.property: When Guild Summit enters the battlefield, you may tap any number of untapped Gates you control. Draw a card for each Gate tapped this way. Whenever a Gate enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a climate of suspicion, Isperia gathered the guilds to propose a radical idea: cooperation.

card.name: Leapfrog
card.property: Leapfrog has flying as long as you've cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Most compete for insects at street level. Some dwell near Izzet laboratories and ride the thermal updrafts."—Yolov, Simic bioengineer

card.name: Maximize Altitude
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn. Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

card.name: Mission Briefing
card.property: Surveil 2, then choose an instant or sorcery card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn. If that card would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead. (To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Murmuring Mystic
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 blue Bird Illusion creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rumors float through the city like crows, alighting on citizens seemingly at random.

card.name: Muse Drake
card.property: Flying When Muse Drake enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A composer wrote a symphony based on the drakes screeching outside her window. Reviews were mixed—except among the drakes.

card.name: Narcomoeba
card.property: Flying When Narcomoeba is put into your graveyard from your library, you may put it onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What bait do you cast to catch a dream?"—Ravnican riddle

card.name: Nightveil Sprite
card.property: Flying Whenever Nightveil Sprite attacks, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We're on the fortieth floor, with one window, no balcony. No one could possibly get in."—Minosz, Orzhov chief of security

card.name: Omnispell Adept
card.property: {2} {U}, {T}: You may cast an instant or sorcery card from your hand without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She memorized every arcane text in the Ismeri Library by the time she was sixteen. Now she quizzes sphinxes in her spare time.

card.name: Passwall Adept
card.property: {2} {U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My doors are called trespassing, my signatures, forgeries. They don't respect my talents, and I don't respect their labels."

card.name: Quasiduplicate
card.property: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control. Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

card.name: Radical Idea
card.property: Draw a card. Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Genius is finding the edge of what's possible, then jumping over it.

card.name: Selective Snare
card.property: Return X target creatures of the creature type of your choice to their owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How thoughtful of the Legion to train its soldiers to fit our spell's specifications."—Nefara, Dimir agent

card.name: Sinister Sabotage
card.property: Counter target spell. Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have intel that some guilds have fallen under an invader's influence. Until we're sure, no venture succeeds."—Lazav

card.name: Thoughtbound Phantasm
card.property: Defender Whenever you surveil, put a +1/+1 counter on Thoughtbound Phantasm. As long as Thoughtbound Phantasm has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.

card.name: Unexplained Disappearance
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first thing the mist chills is the mind. Victims never cry out or even murmur in surprise.

card.name: Vedalken Mesmerist
card.property: Whenever Vedalken Mesmerist attacks, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's no need to sound the alarm. You are minding your post admirably. I am authorized. All is well."

card.name: Wall of Mist
card.property: Defender

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fog haunts the streets, rendering familiar as otherworldly, changing neighbors into shadows, and muffling cries for help.

card.name: Watcher in the Mist
card.property: Flying When Watcher in the Mist enters the battlefield, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on the top of your library in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What wishes do they grant? Mostly pinching-related ones."—Omik, superintendent of waterworks

card.name: Barrier of Bones
card.property: Defender When Barrier of Bones enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Dimir rarely make statements, but when they do, the message is clear.

card.name: Bartizan Bats
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bats are welcome to eat thousands of my pets. I have multitudes more that will ultimately eat the bats."—Izoni

card.name: Blood Operative
card.property: Lifelink When Blood Operative enters the battlefield, you may exile target card from a graveyard. Whenever you surveil, if Blood Operative is in your graveyard, you may pay 3 life. If you do, return Blood Operative to your hand.

card.name: Burglar Rat
card.property: When Burglar Rat enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even rats hoard their treasures. Are your precious things so different?"—Izoni

card.name: Child of Night
card.property: Lifelink

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No guilds—that is her rule. The House vampires unnerve her. The Combine would dissect her, the Legion burn her, the Conclave "cure" her. The shadows are all the family she needs.

card.name: Creeping Chill
card.property: Creeping Chill deals 3 damage to each opponent and you gain 3 life. When Creeping Chill is put into your graveyard from your library, you may exile it. If you do, Creeping Chill deals 3 damage to each opponent and you gain 3 life.

card.name: Dead Weight
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All things considered, his first day on patrol could have gone better.

card.name: Deadly Visit
card.property: Destroy target creature. Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Doom Whisperer
card.property: Flying, trample Pay 2 life: Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on the top of your library in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sound of every twisted secret tempts you to hear another.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The party of Rakdos revelers cackled and capered as the thing approached. It hissed, and they jabbed their torches at it, giggling when it recoiled. Then, one by one, the torches went out—and the screaming began.

card.name: Gruesome Menagerie
card.property: Choose a creature card with converted mana cost 1 in your graveyard, then do the same for creature cards with converted mana costs 2 and 3. Return those cards to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Variety is also the spice of death."—Cevraya, Golgari shaman

card.name: Hired Poisoner
card.property: Deathtouch

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They don't even feel the cut. I'm ordering a drink in a nearby tavern before anyone notices something's wrong."

card.name: Kraul Swarm
card.property: Flying {2}{B}, Discard a creature card: Return Kraul Swarm from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hive has a long memory. It knows how every member has died, and tow home it owes the grudge.

card.name: Lotleth Giant
card.property: Undergrowth — When Lotleth Giant enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target opponent for each creature card in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I prefer the big and looming to the small and skittering."—Cevraya, Golgari shaman

card.name: Mausoleum Secrets
card.property: Undergrowth — Search your library for a black card with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Mephitic Vapors
card.property: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn. Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on the top of your library in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ravnica's safest strongholds are often neither.

card.name: Midnight Reaper
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, Midnight Reaper deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one welcomes his visit, yet all must grant him tribute.

card.name: Moodmark Painter
card.property: Undergrowth — When Moodmark Painter enters the battlefield, target creature gains menace and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. (It can't blocked except by two or more creatures.)

card.name: Necrotic Wound
card.property: Undergrowth — Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The assassins of Ochran distill toxins from the remains of the previous victims.

card.name: Never Happened
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from that player's graveyard or hand and exile it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dimir assassins have the precision to slay a single memory.

card.name: Pilfering Imp
card.property: Flying {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Pilfering Imp: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Plaguecrafter
card.property: When Plaguecrafter enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. Each player who can't discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My power is generosity, in a way. I give my survivors an appreciation for their lives."

card.name: Price of Fame
card.property: This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a legendary creature. Destroy target creature. Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Ritual of Soot
card.property: Destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the patrol's armor was found, so tainted with the acrid smell of sudden death that it could never be worn again.

card.name: Severed Strands
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness. Destroy target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've seen Ravnica's fate. Believe me, I'm doing you a favor."

card.name: Spinal Centipede
card.property: When Spinal Centipede dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Golgari adorn themselves with the exoskeletons of iridescent insects. It's only fair the insects do likewise.

card.name: Undercity Necrolisk
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Undercity Necrolisk. It gains menace until end of turn. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In its territory, living is an affront.

card.name: Veiled Shade
card.property: {1} {B}: Veiled Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I sang songs of sorrow for my lost love. Imagine my horror when, one night, they were answered."—Milana, Orzhov prelate

card.name: Vicious Rumors
card.property: Vicious Rumors deals 1 damage to each opponent. Each opponent discards a card, then puts the top card of their library into their graveyard. You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The alliances were already frayed. All we do is find the loose threads and pluck."—Lazav

card.name: Whispering Snitch
card.property: Whenever you surveil for the first time each turn, Whispering Snitch deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sure, I hear things. I hear plenty. But how am I to talk with this parched throat?"

card.name: Arclight Phoenix
card.property: Flying, haste At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you've cast three or more instant and sorcery spells this turn, return Arclight Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Barging Sergeant
card.property: Haste Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't stop till your horns come out their back."

card.name: Book Devourer
card.property: Trample Whenever Book Devourer deals combat damage to a player, you may discard all the cards in your hand. If you do, draw that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Not my first edition of *The Advokist and the Urchin*!"

card.name: Command the Storm
card.property: Command the Storm deals 5 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the wake of Niv-Mizzet's disappearance, Ral found himself leading the guild. He had dreamed of this day, but couldn't help feeling like a pawn in someone else's game.

card.name: Cosmotronic Wave
card.property: Cosmotronic Wave deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control. Creatures your opponents control can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This sort of innovation occurs when you set out to improve an electric tea kettle and misplace a decimal."

card.name: Direct Current
card.property: Direct Current deals 2 damage to any target. Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

card.name: Electrostatic Field
card.property: Defender Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Electrostatic Field deals 1 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's both an ingress-denial mechanism and an attractive hallway light!"—Daxiver, Izzet electromancer

card.name: Erratic Cyclops
card.property: Trample Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Erratic Cyclops gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The League accepts no responsibility for former members and the damage they may cause."—Maree, Izzet chamberlain

card.name: Experimental Frenzy
card.property: You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may play lands and cast spells from the top of your library. You can't play lands or cast spells from your hand. {3}{R}: Destroy Experimental Frenzy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Turns out coffee is the weird aunt of invention.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I spent some time in the Legion, but I'm done taking orders all day."

card.name: Fire Urchin
card.property: Trample Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Fire Urchin gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rain runoff in the Smelting District is known to spontaneously burst into flame.

card.name: Goblin Banneret
card.property: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.) {1}{R}: Goblin Banneret gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Boros banner stands tall even if its bearer doesn't.

card.name: Goblin Cratermaker
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice Goblin Cratermaker: Choose one — • Goblin Cratermaker deals 2 damage to target creature. • Destroy target colorless nonland permanent.

card.name: Goblin Locksmith
card.property: Whenever Goblin Locksmith attacks, creatures with defender can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He's got more finesse than most goblins. He smashes windows with his fist rather than his forehead."—Arrester Polgar

card.name: Gravitic Punch
card.property: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target player. Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

card.name: Hellkite Whelp
card.property: Flying Whenever Hellkite Whelp attacks, it deals 1 damage to target creature defending player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They play by spitting fire at each other. Don't be offended if one gives you a love-scorch."—Esfir, Rakdos dragon wrangler

card.name: Inescapable Blaze
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Inescapable Blaze deals 6 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Izzet are blamed for every little disaster, which is unfair because we only cause most of them."— Mizzix of the Izmagnus

card.name: Lava Coil
card.property: Lava Coil deals 4 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Commander, we caught the Dimir spy and took her ashes into custody."—Kramm, Wojek security officer

card.name: Legion Warboss

card.name: Assure // Assemble

alternate.name: Assure
alternate.property: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

alternate.name: Assemble
alternate.property: Create three 2/2 green and white Elf Knight creature tokens with vigilance.

card.name: Connive // Concoct

alternate.name: Connive
alternate.property: Gain control of target creature with power 2 or less.

alternate.name: Concoct
alternate.property: Surveil 3, then return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Discovery // Dispersal

alternate.name: Discovery
alternate.property: Surveil 2, then draw a card. (To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

alternate.name: Dispersal
alternate.property: Each opponent returns a nonland permanent they control with the highest converted mana cost among permanents they control to its owner's hand, then discards a card.

card.name: Expansion // Explosion

alternate.name: Expansion
alternate.property: Copy target instant or sorcery spell with converted mana cost 4 or less. You may choose new targets for the copy.

alternate.name: Explosion
alternate.property: Explosion deals X damage to any target. Target player draws X cards.

card.name: Find // Finality

alternate.name: Find
alternate.property: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

alternate.name: Finality
alternate.property: You may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature you control. Then all creatures get -4/-4 until end of turn.

card.name: Flower // Flourish

alternate.name: Flower
alternate.property: Search your library for a basic Forest or Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

alternate.name: Flourish
alternate.property: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Integrity // Intervention

alternate.name: Integrity
alternate.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

alternate.name: Intervention
alternate.property: Intervention deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

card.name: Invert // Invent

alternate.name: Invert
alternate.property: Switch the power and toughness of each of up to two target creatures until end of turn.

alternate.name: Invent
alternate.property: Search your library for an instant card and/or a sorcery card, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Response // Resurgence

alternate.name: Response
alternate.property: Response deals 5 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

alternate.name: Resurgence
alternate.property: Creatures you control gain first strike and vigilance until end of turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

card.name: Status // Statue

alternate.name: Status
alternate.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.

alternate.name: Statue
alternate.property: Destroy target artifact, creature, or enchantment.
